meta.name: Pathway
meta.description: Transform your productivity with AI, gamification and social networks.

hero.subheading: The first platform that combines artificial intelligence with gamification and proven learning techniques for extraordinary results.

first.heading: FROM INSPIRATION TO MASTERY
first.subheading: We transform your ideas into concrete skills, step by step

second.heading: MASTER YOUR PROGRESS
second.subheading: Test your knowledge and reinforce your learning

third.heading: HUMAN POTENTIAL WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
third.subheading: Technology that adapts to your way of learning

feedback.heading: We Listen to People
feedback.text: We understand that opinions on gamification, productivity apps, and social media sharing are key. We've taken their insights into account to design an experience that combines the best of everything.

features.transform_subheading: Set goals, track progress, and achieve the perfect balance between academics, social life, and personal growth with our holistic development platform

goal_setting.title: Strategic Skills Development
descriptions: Our platform helps you map essential skills for your major and charts practical learning paths to master them step by step.
Whether you need to enhance your research abilities, communication, data analysis, time management, or leadership skills, we monitor your progress toward competency.
benefits: Identification of critical skills specific to your field of study
Personalized learning paths with resources, exercises, and practical projects
Visual tracking of progressive mastery for each competency
Validation of acquired skills through real-world application projects

college_organization.title: College Life, Perfectly Organized
descriptions: Balance academics, fitness, nutrition, and social life with our smart scheduling system designed specifically for busy college students.

features.title: Balance Study & Life
features.description: Smart scheduling that integrates classes, workouts, meals, and relaxation.

features.title: Health & Fitness Tracking
features.description: Never miss workouts or meals with built-in reminders and habit tracking.

features.title: Campus Life Integration
features.description: Sync with campus events, class schedules, and study groups automatically.

progress_analytics.title: College Progress Analytics
descriptions: Monitor your college balance with comprehensive analytics highlighting your achievements and areas for improvement across academics, physical fitness, and social life.
Visualize your progress throughout the semester and gain insights into your daily patterns to optimize your college routine.

key_insight.title: Key Insight
key_insight.description: Peak performance achieved when combining morning exercise, proper nutrition, and focused study.

newsletter.heading: Don't Miss Out!
newsletter.subheading: Subscribe to receive a notification when the app is available.

messages.provide_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address
messages.subscription_failed: There was an error subscribing you. Please try again.

terms.agreement: By subscribing, I agree to the
terms.agree_message: Please agree to the terms and conditions to continue.

footer.description: Innovative AI solutions for tomorrow's challenges.

ui.use: We use tests to measure progress
ui.title: Learning Test:
ui.start_message: Click on "Start" to see the sample animation

how_tests_work.title: How Our Tests Help You Learn
how_tests_work.description: Our intelligent testing system adapts to your learning journey, providing personalized feedback and tracking your progress over time.

section1.title: Answer Questions At Your Own Pace
descriptions: Our tests are designed to be taken at your convenience. Each test is tailored to measure your understanding of specific objectives.
You'll answer a series of questions related to your learning goals, helping you identify areas where you excel and where you might need additional practice.
benefits: Tests aligned with your learning objectives
Answer at your own pace with no time pressure

q1.question: What is the first step in the learning process?

q2.question: How often should you review material?
q2.answer: At regular intervals based on retention studies

section2.title: Smart Evaluation Process
descriptions: When you submit your test, our system goes to work analyzing your answers against learning objectives.
We don't just count right and wrong answers - we look for patterns in your responses to provide meaningful insights about your learning progress.

steps.title: Analyzing Responses
steps.description: Your answers are evaluated against learning objectives

steps.title: Identifying Patterns
steps.description: We detect your strengths and areas for improvement

steps.title: Preparing Feedback
steps.description: Creating personalized recommendations for next steps

section3.title: Track Your Progress Over Time
descriptions: After evaluation, you'll receive a clear breakdown of your results with specific feedback on each question.
Your performance is tracked over time, allowing you to see how you're progressing toward mastery of your learning objectives.

insight.title: Learning Insights
insight.content: Tests help identify knowledge gaps and reinforce learning through the testing effect - the act of retrieving information strengthens memory.

q2.question: How many review sessions are optimal?

cta.title: Ready to Track Your Progress?
cta.description: Start testing your knowledge and see how you're advancing toward your learning goals.

marathon: Build endurance with weekly long runs

symbol.question: What does the 'p' symbol mean in sheet music?

keys.question: How many white keys does a standard piano have?

chord.question: Which notes make up a C major chord?

position.question: What's the correct finger position for a C scale?
position.answer: Thumb on C, index on D, middle on E

pedal.question: What does the right pedal do?
pedal.answer: Sustains the notes (wrong: makes sound louder)

gamification.title: Opinion on Gamification
gamification.content: Gamification systems have changed how I achieve my goals. But sometimes the competition can be overwhelming.

productivity.title: Opinion on Productivity Apps
productivity.content: Apps have helped me stay organized, but I find some difficult to use.

social.title: Opinion on Social Networks
social.content: Sharing my achievements on social media motivates me, though I don't want my privacy compromised.

general.title: General Opinion
general.content: A combination of gamification, productivity and social networks is ideal, but should be balanced and easy to use.

terms.intro_paragraph: Welcome to our application. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our newsletter service and outline the rules for subscribing to our communications.
terms.acceptance_paragraph: By subscribing to our newsletter, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not subscribe to our newsletter.

newsletter.title: Newsletter Service Description
newsletter.description: Our newsletter is designed to keep subscribers informed about our application and services. By subscribing, you will receive emails related to:
purposes: Commercial offers, promotions, and discount opportunities related to our application
Invitations to participate in beta testing of new application features and functionalities
Polls and surveys regarding potential new features and your preferences
Launch announcements for new features, services, and application updates

subscription.title: Subscription Terms
paragraphs: To subscribe to our newsletter, you must provide a valid email address. You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of the information you provide.
The frequency of our communications may vary based on our release schedule, promotions, and other factors. We aim to send relevant content and avoid excessive communications.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Usage
paragraphs: When you subscribe to our newsletter, we collect your email address and any other information you voluntarily provide. This information is used to send you the newsletter and to personalize content based on your preferences.
We may use tracking technologies to monitor how subscribers interact with our emails, including open rates and click-through rates. This data helps us improve our communications and services.

Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We will not sell or rent your email address to third parties, although we may share anonymized, aggregated data for analytical purposes.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribing
unsubscribe.paragraph: You may unsubscribe from our newsletter at any time by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link included in every email we send, or by contacting us directly. Upon unsubscribing, we will promptly remove your email address from our distribution list for marketing communications, though we may retain certain information as required for legal or legitimate business purposes.

content.title: Newsletter Content
paragraphs: While we strive to ensure the accuracy of the information contained in our newsletters, we do not warrant that all content will be error-free. Promotional offers may be subject to additional terms and conditions, which will be clearly communicated.

We reserve the right to determine the content, timing, and recipients of our newsletters. Beta testing invitations and feature polls may be sent to selected segments of our subscriber base based on usage patterns, previous feedback, or other criteria.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.paragraph: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify subscribers of any material changes via email. Your continued subscription to our newsletter following such notification constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions or our newsletter service, please contact our support team. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and thoroughly.

privacy.intro_paragraph: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our application and services. We are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of all our users.
privacy.scope_paragraph: By using our application, subscribing to our newsletter, or interacting with our services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.paragraph: We collect minimal information necessary to provide and improve our services. This may include:
items: Email address (when subscribing to our newsletter)
Anonymous usage data (such as interaction patterns and feature usage)

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence Usage
paragraphs: Our application utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to enhance user experience. Our AI systems operate without collecting or processing personal data.
All AI functionality is designed with privacy by design principles, ensuring that no personally identifiable information is required for the AI features to function effectively.
Our AI systems are used primarily for:
uses: Generating personalized recommendations based on anonymized usage patterns
Creating and optimizing content within the application
Providing automated support responses based on common queries

no_personal_data.title: No Collection of Personal Data
paragraphs: Our AI systems are specifically designed to function without collecting, storing, or processing personal data. They operate on anonymized and aggregated data patterns that cannot be traced back to individual users.
When interacting with AI features in our application, your inputs are processed in real-time and are not stored or used to build user profiles.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
paragraphs: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our application. These cookies do not track your browsing activity on other websites or collect personal information.
You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, although this may limit your ability to use certain features of our application.

security.title: Data Security
security.paragraph: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the information we collect and process. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.paragraph: Our application may integrate with third-party services for specific functionalities. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. We do not share your information with third parties for marketing purposes.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.paragraph: You have certain rights regarding your information. These include:
items: The right to access any information we have about you
The right to request deletion of your email address from our newsletter subscription list
The right to object to processing of your information

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the application.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact our support team. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and thoroughly.
